summary:

body:
*in the hospital*

peter parker: hey mr. stark do you know my blood type?

tony: yeah b positive.

peter: *pulling the IV out of his arm* i guessed wrong. NURSE!

tags: antman isnt in the quantum realm anymore
summary: Marvel: Some people move on, but not us. Never us. Me (and probably the entire MCU fandom): Bitch no has moved on from anything....
body:
Marvel: Some people move on, but not us. Never us.

Me (and probably the entire MCU fandom): Bitch no has moved on from anything. No one’s recovering from the curve balls you keep throwing at us.

*visions of every single bad thing that has happened in the MCU flashing through my eyes*

tags: i kind of went off with this
summary: A song that I feel like describes Tony Starks journey through out all the marvel movies especially in avengers infinitywars :...
question: A song that I feel like describes Tony Starks journey through out all the marvel movies especially in avengers infinitywars : face my fears by utada hikaru. Because I always feel like a part of tony is terrified, but his heart is always bigger than his fear.
answer:
I haven’t heard this song, but I’m playing it as I type this.

Okay, you’re right. This is definitely a Tony Stark song. I think Tony has so much fear, both on the surface and much deeper inside that he keeps hidden. Even if fandom runs with it, I genuinely think there is a fear of losing a loved one that Tony actively tries to face with his canon-relationship with Pepper and then his mentorship with Peter. He is clearly scared of enclosed spaces and the dark, but puts himself in these positions a number of times in order to save others. 

I think the lyric “let me face my fears” is powerful in itself. It’s not saying “I will face” or “I am facing”, but “let me.” To me, this reads as both a plea and a promise. It’s asking someone for a little time and patience, for them to step back and let the speaker work through their own problems. Linked with the following phrase of “won’t be long, I’m almost here,” it’s also promising that it might take some time, but that the speaker will in fact come through this and move forward with strength. 

It’s just a very Tony song and I love it.

I haven’t heard this song, but I’m playing it as I type this.

summary: What about top 5 general AU's? Doesn't have to be written, but stuff you like to read?
question: What about top 5 general AU's? Doesn't have to be written, but stuff you like to read?
answer:
hmmm.

  1. hs or college au tony bc i love school au’s
  2. witch!tony or some type of supernatural theme
  3. non powered aus in general like coffee shops or flower shops bc he’s a cute boy
  4. tony + some type of disability bc its rlly cool how ppl integrate it into his life and work w it. so theres mute!tony from Thumb, Index, and Pinky Extended, deaf!tony from The Problem With Communication & (Dont Wanna Be) All By Myself, amputee!tony from a lot of avac fics where the one gauntlet he wears is a prosthetic. i also love blind!tony but i cant remember a fic off the top of my head rn. just things that ppl expect to hinder/debilitate him in some way and sorta do but Mostly Dont bc its tony, u get me
  5. also fics where tony has an intense stutter and/or anxiety

title: Soulmarks
excerpt: I'm probably making art based on this Irondad au that I came up with based on soulmarks that aren't romantic but familial. Whether biological or not, everyone has markings to represent their parents or parental figures and later develop one for children and spouses. When the person that the mark represents dies, the normally colorful or even glowing marks turn ashy and black and even painful at first. That's the basics but I might develop the AU more. Most of these are just ideas or aesthetic influences. I've made up meaning for all of them and took a lot of time thinking about them so they are not random lol.
description: I’ll probably do art for this AU so I would really appreciate it if you guys looked at it. I might add more ideas if we want to include Harley, Riri, Shuri etc into this AU.

tags: Iron Dad and his Spider Son
summary: Thoughts on the iron dad spider son thing please
question: Thoughts on the iron dad spider son thing please
answer:
I mean, I’ve had more Iron Dad & Spider Son in How Big, How Blue, How Beautiful so far than I’ve had FrostIron and for someone who usually writes solely motivated by ships, that’s saying something, I think.

I’m generally a sucker for the trope of “If your blood-family sucks or is broken, find and make your own family out of people you love”, so that is totally my tune. *^*

I think it’s very cute and unlike some other headcanons that are very wildly out there - gods, remember Clint living in the vents? Those were times *chuckles* - this one is at least heavily based on canon, so there’s that. Not saying that headcanons have to have anything to do with canon, but especially with ones that so widely take over a fandom, I do appreciate when you can like… trace back where it even comes from. xD”

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: HBD Loser
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2t7A36u

by forensicleaf

“Up and at ‘em, champ! Otherwise you’re not gonna have time to open your presents before school.” May wiggles her eyebrows.

Presents?

Peter feels a smile creep across his face, and May’s own widens in response. He’d almost forgotten.

“Happy birthday, honey,” May says, pressing a kiss to the top of his head. Then she ruffles his hair, laughing as Peter rolls his eyes and pushes her away. “Now come on. I made breakfast.”

Words: 4903, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man), Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones, Flash Thompson
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: birthday fic, Fluff, I swear this is just cute happy nonsense, Peter Parker has a great day, because he deserves it, tiniest bit of angst, Because it’s me


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2t7A36u

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2t7A36u

by forensicleaf

“Up and at ‘em, champ! Otherwise you’re not gonna have time to open your presents before school.” May wiggles her eyebrows.

Presents?

Peter feels a smile creep across his face, and May’s own widens in response. He’d almost forgotten.

“Happy birthday, honey,” May says, pressing a kiss to the top of his head. Then she ruffles his hair, laughing as Peter rolls his eyes and pushes her away. “Now come on. I made breakfast.”

title: Family Matters
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GcrDUf

by LetsJustWrite

Fresh out of rehab Loki is faced either with being homeless again or living with Thor and his friends in Tony Stark’s (daddy payed) mansion. He doesn’t have much of a choice if he wants to stay clean and so he goes to the mansion. Nobody but Thor is happy about it.

Part of a series but stands on its own

Words: 391, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of How to Find a Family (Loki)
